name: Cube³ (WIP)
description:
A cute little game about cube and perspective loop ! Made for the Ludum Dare 47#

Help little Cubbi to find the path in his cubic world where you can easily loop and travel around your planet. Maybe a little zoom out will help you on your way !

(There's only 4 level.., for now)

*WIP : For now, we have a bug who prevents the player to finish the level. Some features are not working properly too . Like the sound fx, the star scoring system and some UI, we will fix it in a bugfix update soon*

ArrowKeys / WASD : Move, select

Space Bar : Jump, Turn cube face pattern

E : Zoom out/in (Toggle Plateform/Cube Pattern Mode)

R : Restart the level

Delete : Go back, go back to the menu

Chaomans#2214 and Ricoo#6779 : Programmers

Meistuko#7782 and PASTEQUE#2479 : Graphists and UI designers

Afeliand#8663 : Sound Designer

MiamLesChocapics (Jules.Feydy) #6278 : Game Designer and Music

Hope you will enjoy this short experiment ^^
